name: NSX-T Details
description: View in one page of the configured Transport Node(e), Edge Node(s), Edge Cluster(s), and Compute Manager(s). In the TN(s), EN(s) tabs, informations related to Deployment, Mgmt and Control Plane status are shown

name: NSX-T Usage
description: Collection of Network, Security , and Inventory Usage in one page view. Max values are provided by the NSX-T itself. Coded in NSX-T and related to the NSX-T Version. Informations concerning configuration max are available here: https://configmax.vmware.com/home

name: NSX-T Fabric - Manager Infos
description: Informations related to the NSX Manager(s) and its Cluster. This view shows the status of the NSX Manager Services. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.

name: NSX-T Fabric - Host/Edge Nodes
description: Informations related to the Host and Edge Transport Nodes. Details per TN showing informations on NSX VDS and associated TZ(s) and interface. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.

name: NSX-T Fabric - Transport Zones
description: Informations related to the configured Transport Zones in the NSX-T system (default and configured). Details per TZ on NSX VDS type/Mode/Name. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.
file_cli: Zone does not stand for Zombie One

name: NSX-T Fabric - Tunnels
description: Informations related to the VTEP Tunnels in the NSX-T system. Details show the TN, Local and Remote IP, encap and Status. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.

name: NSX-T Fabric - IP Pools
description: Informations related to the configured IP Pools through Policy in NSX-T system. It contains Name, ID, Range, IP Block(s) and Allocated IPs per IP Pool. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.

name: NSX-T Fabric - Monitoring & Alarms
description: Informations related to the current Alarms known  in the NSX-T system. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.

name: Virtual Networking - Segments
description: Informations related to the configured Segments through Policy in the NSX-T system. Details of the TZ,Replication Mode, VNI, Type, Subnet, Gw. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.
file_cli: When you're in the Cloud, Vaporware becomes Reality

name: Virtual Networking - Logical Router Summary
description: Informations related to the configured Logical Routers in the NSX-T system - Through Policy and Manager. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.

name: Virtual Networking - Logical Router Ports
description: Informations related to the Logical Router Ports in the NSX-T system. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.

name: Virtual Networking - T0 BGP Sessions
description: Informations related to the configured T0 BGP Sessions through Policy in the NSX-T system. Details per session like BGP Status, Source and Dest IP ASN, # of Prefixes. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.
file_cli: Routing, routing, yes but with BGP. You want to use OSPF ? Sure ? Really ? Really ????

name: Virtual Networking - Routing Tables
description: Informations related to the Routing Tables in T0 and T1s (Policy only) in the NSX-T system. Info per Edge Node. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.
file_cli: Routing Tables, not Turning Tables.... Stop now Gandalf.

name: Security - Security Groups Infos
description: Informations related to the configured Groups through Policy in the NSX-T system. Listing the Criteria Type(s) and the Criteria(s). Details contain IP adresses, VM Members, Segments and Segments Ports part of this Group. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.
file_cli: 'Group ! Group ! Group !' and not 'Gloup ! Gloup ! Gloup !'

name: Security - Distributed Firewall Rules
description: Informations related to the configured Policy Firewall Rules per Section per Categories in the NSX-T system (default and configured). Applied To per Section shown in info button. Details per Rule. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.

name: Security - Services
description: Informations related to the configured Services at Policy level in the NSX-T system. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.

name: Security - Security Policies
description: Informations related to the configured Security Policies in the NSX-T system. These informations are available in the FDFW part too. Showing only the Security Policy here. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.

name: Security - Virtual Machines
description: Informations related to the VMs in the NSX-T system. Infos on the Host, Tag, Segment and Groups. Details showing the vNICs and the associated Firewall Rules per vNIC. Export to xls/json/yaml/csv available.
file_cli: Welcome to the Machine ! - Pink Floyd

name: Audit
description: Informations related to the above menus you can choose to export by selecting the buttons. Once the informations are collected, Export button will be available and you will download the result directly to your machine. To do a global Diff, first do a 'get all config' in JSON. Then do some changes on your NSX, and then re do a 'get all config'. At this step, you can do a diff between the two JSON fils you create before.
